title: So Pokemon Go is even more broken now than it was on release
body:
Since the last update the tracker has been completely broken for me and all of my friends.
Every Pokemon shows as 3 steps away, and appears in a random order on the tracking screen, so you can't even tell if you're getting closer by the change in position on the list, and no matter which direction you go in, the tracker flashes green.

And it's been this way for more than a week. 
How the fuck do you fuck up the basic, most important function of the fucking game this badly and still stay so fucking popular?

I don't get it.
